PropertyValue.Value: select * from (select blii.line_name,bsi.station_id,bsi.station_cn_name,pri.operator_name,sto.operator_id,sto.original_money, sto.later_money-sto.original_money changeNum,sto.later_money,sto.update_date,sto.update_time,decode(sto.change_type,'00','调入','01','调出','02','库存调整','03','现金解行','04','现金待解行','05','钱箱补充','06','钱箱清点','07','操作员领用','08','操作员归还' ) as change_type_name,sto.change_type,sto.currency_code,bam.currency_name,sto.remark from cash_store_change_log sto left join basi_station_info bsi on bsi.station_id = sto.station_id left join basi_line_id_info blii on blii.line_id = sto.line_id left join priv_operator_info pri on pri.operator_id = sto.operator_id left join basi_money_type_info bam on bam.currency_code = sto.currency_code)
